name: Flame Con - NYC's First LGBTQ Comic Con!
blurb: Help Geeks OUT heat up NYC with a super-queer comic con!

name: Lubbock-Con
blurb: Comic-con style, fan-based, community driven, all inclusive convention coming to the South Plains!

name: Enroot: Farm-to-Table Dinner Initiative
blurb: We are a traveling kitchen, committed to hosting farm-to-table events on farms in the UK in an effort to generate support for farmers.

name: Tea Lovers Festival: 10 Years!
blurb: Our mission is to promote the love of tea through education and diverse cultural experiences. Save The Dates: MAY 1 - 3, 2015

name: Panel One : Comic Creator Festival
blurb: A festival by comic creators for comic creators and fans showcasing original work and the local individuals behind the stories.

name: Twin Tiers Comic-Con 2016
blurb: The 3rd annual T2C2 is hoping to be bigger than ever! Run BY fans FOR fans, T2C2 brings the Upstate NY comics & pop community together!

name: Food Book Fair 2016
blurb: Join us in writing the next chapter of Food Book Fair, the first-of-its-kind festival all about food media!

name: Savannah's First Wood Fired Pizza Caterer on Wheels!
blurb: Savannah's first wood fired pizza caterer, on wheels!  Handcrafted wood-fired pizzas made on-site for your special event.

name: Resource Based Economy Banquet
blurb: Let's feast! Come & learn how we can create a sustainable living environment for all of humanity to thrive. It's a release party too!

name: Indie Comic Con
blurb: If funded, Indie Comic Con will be Melbourne's newest comic book festival showcasing independent comic artists, writers and creators.

name: First-Ever #soNEWfriends Event
blurb: #soNEWfriends is an event with the purpose of providing a place for people to create new connections at unique local venues.

name: My first Comic Con-Fandemic Tour 2018!
blurb: I'm raising funds and creating art for Fandemic Tour- Houston! I need help funding prints, setup supplies, & miscellaneous costs.

name: Empower Learning with U Cre-8 Comics
blurb: U Cre-8 Comics is bringing innovative programming and pop cultural engagement to the classroom for 2000 students in Central Ohio.

name: Fort Myers' Cat Cafe - Cattyshack Cafe
blurb: A cage free environment for adoptable rescue cats with coffee, pastries, beer, wine and community events like cat yoga and live music!

name: This Is What Democracy Looks Like, A Comic Book, A Road Trip
blurb: Help us spread democracy in classrooms throughout the USA!

name: WILLY'S WONDERLAND SPECIAL EDITION FIRST ISSUE COMIC BOOK
blurb: The Bloody Movie Gets The Comic Book Prequel Series It Deserves Revealing Some Of The Horrific Events Leading Up To The Hit Film!

name: Highland Heights Comic Con @Northern Kentucky University
blurb: A comic-centric convention for the fine people of the Cincinnati Metro Area on March 18th 2023 @ NKU's Student Union
